subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts made it apparent early that there would be no suspense in the final round of the Senior Players Championship at Timonium, Md.Roberts made four consecutive birdies during a sizzling front nine, finishing with a three-under-par 67 to defeat Tom Watson by six strokes. He finished with a 13-under 267 total to claim the $390,000 winner’s check.Watson shot a 68 yesterday. Fred Funk shot a 71 to tie for third with Scott Simpson (65).
